== Description ==

This page contains the test results for the Bluetooth testing on Ubuntu Touch devices. It can be used to save the test results for reference and better understanding how different devices behave as we move forward with the development.

Make sure that the Description is meaningful and gives a good understanding of the test run. If possible, include a link to the CI Ticket in it.
